venues.name: California State University Monterey Bay World Theater Building

blurb.english: Public comments will be heard at 9:00am for items not on the agenda, for no more than 30 minutes. For those unable to attend the early comment period, there may be additional comment time available later in the day. Note: Comments made during the general public comment period regarding matters pending before the Commission do not become part of the official record for those matters.
blurb.spanish: Se oirán los comentarios públicos a las 9:00am para temas que no estén en la agenda, durante no más de 30 minutos. Para aquellos que no puedan asistir al periodo inicial de comentarios, puede haber tiempo adicional para comentarios más tarde en el día. Nota: Los comentarios hechos durante el periodo de comentarios públicos generales con respecto a asuntos pendientes ante la Comisión no formarán parte del expediente oficial para esos asuntos.

title.english: Application No. 3-14-1613 (Fort Ord Dunes State Park Campground, Monterey Co.)
title.spanish: Solicitud No. 3-14-1613 (Zona de Campamento de Fort Ord Dunes State Park, Monterey Co.)

blurb.english: Application of California Department of Parks and Recreation to construct and operate new campground facility including: 45 full hook-up RV sites, 40 tent sites, 10 hike-/bike-in sites, 2 campground host sites, 4 restroom buildings, multi-use building, campfire center, entrance station, 3 operations and security modular structures, overflow parking, storage yard, maintenance station, beach access trail, on and off-site utilities, native dune restoration, and related development on former Fort Ord property located seaward of Highway One between the cities of Marina and Sand City/Seaside, Monterey County. (MW-SC)
blurb.spanish: Solicitud del Departamento de Parques y Recreación del Departamento de California para construir y operar nuevas instalaciones de campamento incluyendo: 45 sitios de amarre completo para casillas móviles, 40 sitios de carpas, 10 sitios de senderismo y ciclismo, 2 sitios de recepción de campamento, 4 edificios de baños, un edificio multiuso, un centro de fogatas, una estación de entrada, 3 estructuras modulares de operaciones y seguridad, estacionamiento en exceso, recinto de almacenaje, una estación de mantenimiento, un sendero de acceso a la playa, y servicios en el sitio y fuera del sitio, restauración de dunas nativas y desarrollo relacionado en la antigua propiedad de Fort Ord ubicada hacia el lado del mar de Highway One entre las ciudades de Marina y Sand City/Seaside, Condado de Monterey. (MW-SC)

blurb.english: At a convenient time during the meeting, the Commission (CCC) will have a closed session to discuss items of pending litigation, including:
blurb.spanish: En un momento conveniente durante la reunión, la Comisión (CCC) tendrá una sesión cerrada para discutir los temas de litigación pendientes, incluidos:

closed_session.litigation: Capistrano Shores Property, LLC v. CCC, Govt. Code § 11126(e)(2)(A)
Citizens Oversight, Inc. et al. v. CCC, Govt. Code § 11126(e)(2)(A)
Harper v. County of Santa Cruz, Govt. Code § 11126(e)(2)(A)
Lynch et al. v. CCC, Govt. Code § 11126(e)(2)(A)
Martins Beach 1 LLC et al. v. Turnbull Sanders et al., Govt. Code § 11126(e)(2)(A)
San Diego Navy Broadway Complex Coalition v. CCC et al., Govt. Code § 11126(e)(2)(A)
Sierra Club v. CCC et al., Govt. Code § 11126(e)(2)(A) - see item F11a
Surfrider Foundation v. Martins Beach 1 LLC et al., Govt. Code § 11126(e)(2)(A)

blurb.english: The Commission is authorized to discuss these matters in a closed session pursuant to Government Code Sections 11126(e)(2)(A) and (2)(C). In addition, the Commission may consider matters which fall under Government Code Section 11126(e)(2)(B) or (2)(C). The Commission may also consider personnel matters which fall under Government Code Section 11126(a).
blurb.spanish: La Comisión está autorizada a discutir estos asuntos en una sesión cerrada de conformidad con el Código del Gobierno, Secciones 11126(e)(2)(A) y (2)(C). Además, la Comisión puede considerar asuntos que caen bajo la Sección 11126(e)(2)(B) o (2)(C) del Código del Gobierno. La Comisión también puede considerar asuntos de personal que caen bajo la Sección 11126(a) del Código del Gobierno.

title.spanish: Informe de Conservancy de las Montañas de Santa Mónica
Informe de Restauración de la Bahía de santa Mónica
Informe de Subdirector de Subprocurador General
Viaje de Estudios de la Comisión

blurb.english: The Commission will take a field trip, leaving the California State University Monterey Bay World Theater Building after lunch (time estimate for departure is 1:00 p.m.) on Wednesday July 12th for a tour of the proposed Fort Ord Dunes State Park campground, and to view the site of the proposed Collection Resort project in Sand City. The field trip will end in time for the Commission to convene its regular afternoon agenda at around 2:45 p.m. The public is invited to attend by following the Commission vehicles in their own private vehicles and joining the Commission at several designated stops. For more information, please contact the Commission’s Central Coast District office in Santa Cruz at (831) 427-4863.
blurb.spanish: The Commission will take a field trip, leaving the California State University Monterey Bay World Theater Building after lunch (time estimate for departure is 1:00 p.m.) on Wednesday July 12th for a tour of the proposed Fort Ord Dunes State Park campground, and to view the site of the proposed Collection Resort project in Sand City. The field trip will end in time for the Commission to convene its regular afternoon agenda at around 2:45 p.m. The public is invited to attend by following the Commission vehicles in their own private vehicles and joining the Commission at several designated stops. For more information, please contact the Commission’s Central Coast District office in Santa Cruz at (831) 427-4863.

blurb.english:
At the conclusion of the Commission meeting on Wednesday, July 12, or at 5:30 pm, whichever is later, the Commission will attend a reception hosted by the Monterey County Business Council and Monterey Bay Economic Partnership in conjunction with the Office of the President of California State University Monterey Bay to be held at the Alumni & Visitors Center, CSUMB Alumni & Visitor Center 5108 Fourth Avenue Marina, CA  93933. Members of the public are welcome to join the Commission; however, because space is limited, those wishing to attend must make a reservation by contacting Susan Mangan at (831) 582-3439 or smangan@csumb.edu.
 Please note: This is a social event for the Commission, CSUMB, and the public. No lobbying, distribution of materials, signage, or other communication about Commission business should occur at the event. Thank you.
blurb.spanish:
RECEPCIÓN: Al cierre del encuentro del Miércoles 12 de Julio 2017, o a las 5:30 p.m., lo que ocurra más tarde, la Comisión asistirá a una recepción celebrada por la Condado de Monterey Business Council y Monterey Bay Economic Partnership en conjunto con la Oficina del Presidente de California State University Monterey Bay que se celebrará en el at the Alumni & Visitors Center, CSUMB Alumni & Visitor Center 5108 Fourth Avenue Marina, CA  93933. Los miembros del público están invitados a participar en la Comisión; no obstante, como el espacio es limitado, los que deseen asistir deben hacer una reserva comunicándose con Susan Mangan al (831) 582-3439 o smangan@csumb.edu.
 Por favor notar: Este es un evento social para la Comisión y el público. No debe haber en el evento actividades de grupos de intereses, distribución de materiales, carteles ni otra comunicación sobre la actividad de la Comisión. Gracias.

blurb.english: Public comments will be heard at 9:00am for items not on the agenda, for no more than 30 minutes. For those unable to attend the early comment period, there may be additional comment time available later in the day. Note: Comments made during the general public comment period regarding matters pending before the Commission do not become part of the official record for those matters.

blurb.english: Public hearing and action on request by the City of San Diego to amend the certified Implementation Plan (IP) to add footnotes reducing the zoning height for RM zoned properties to 30 ft. in the Peninsula Community Plan coastal zone overlay area and updating the method in which structure height is calculated. (AL-SD)
blurb.spanish: Audiencia pública y acción a pedido de la Ciudad de San Diego para enmendar el Plan de Implementación certificado (IP) para añadir notas al pie que reducen la altura de zonificación para propiedades de zona RM a 30 pies en el área del plan comunitario de Península y que actualizan el método según el cual se calcula la altura de la estructura. (AL-SD)

(AL-SD)

(AL-SD)

title.english: Consent Cease and Desist Order No. CCC-17-CD-02 (RMC Pacific Materials, LLC, d/b/a CEMEX, Marina, Monterey Co.)
title.spanish: Orden de Consentimiento de Cesar y Desistir No. CCC-17-CD-02 (RMC Pacific Materials, LLC, d/b/a CEMEX, Marina, Monterey Co.)

blurb.english: Public hearing and Commission action on proposed consent administrative order directing property owner and mine operator to, among other things: 1) cease, within agreed upon time period, sand extraction on property pursuant to approved cessation plan; 2) remove dredges, equipment associated with dredges, pump stations and other facilities from property pursuant to approved removal plan; 3) cease further unpermitted grading and changes in intensity of use of property; 4) undertake reclamation of property and protect sensitive species on site; and 5) transfer property to approved non-profit or governmental entity for conservation and potential public access and passive recreation purposes; on property located near Lapis Rd., APNs 203-011-019, 203-011-001-000, 203-011-016-000, and 203-011-020-000, City of Marina, Monterey County. (JB-SF)
blurb.spanish: Audiencia pública y acción de la Comisión sobre orden administrativa de consentimiento que instruye a propietario y operador de mina a, entre otras cosas: 1) cesar, dentro del período de tiempo acordado, extracción de tierra en la propiedad conforme al plan de cesación aprobado; 2) eliminar dragados,  equipamiento asociado con Dragados, estaciones de bombeo y otras instalaciones de la propiedad conforme al plan de retiro aprobado; 3) cesar nivelación adicional no autorizada y cambios en la intensidad del uso de la propiedad; 4) realizar reclamación de la propiedad y proteger especies vulnerables en el sitio; y 5) transferir propiedad a entidad aprobada sin fines de lucro o gubernamental para conservación y posible acceso público y fines de recreación pasiva; en propiedad ubicada cerca de Lapis Rd., APNs 203-011-019, 203-011-001-000, 203-011-016-000, y 203-011-020-000, Ciudad de Marina, Condado de Monterey. (JB-SF)

title.english: E-mail correspondence concerning this item may be sent to CemexComments@coastal.ca.gov
title.spanish: Puede enviarse correspondencia por correo electrónico sobre este punto a CemexComments@coastal.ca.gov

blurb.english: Public comments will be heard at 9:00am for items not on the agenda, for no more than 30 minutes. For those unable to attend the early comment period, there may be additional comment time available later in the day. Note: Comments made during the general public comment period regarding matters pending before the Commission do not become part of the official record for those matters.
blurb.spanish: Se oirán los comentarios públicos a las 9:00am para temas que no estén en la agenda, durante no más de 30 minutos. Para aquellos que no puedan asistir al periodo inicial de comentarios, puede haber tiempo adicional para comentarios más tarde en el día. Nota: Los comentarios hechos durante el periodo de comentarios públicos generales con respecto a asuntos pendientes ante la Comisión no formarán parte del expediente oficial para esos asuntos.

title.english: Appeal No. A-3-MCO-09-009 (Rancho Los Robles Subdivision, North Monterey Co.)
title.spanish: Apelación No. A-3-MCO-09-009 (Rancho Los Robles Subdivision, North Monterey Co.)

blurb.english: Appeal by Commissioners Blank and Wan; and Friends, Artists, and Neighbors of Elkhorn Slough of Monterey County decision granting permit with conditions to Heritage/Western Communities LTD for subdivision of 2 parcels totaling 33.58 acres into 76 lots; demolition of 2 single-family homes, 2 barns, and removal of 2 mobile home units; construction of 80 residences, including 68 single-family homes, 4 duplex lots, and 4 apartments; construction of 17,000 sq. feet of commercial space and 9.7 acres of common areas including open space and to provide for future parks and recreation development; and construction of roads and related improvements, at 100 Sill Rd., Las Lomas, North Monterey County. (KK-SC)
blurb.spanish: Apelación por parte de los Comisionados Blank y Wan; y Amigos, Artistas y Vecinos de Elkhorn Slough de la decisión del Condado de Monterey que otorga permiso con condiciones a Heritage/Western Communities LTD para subdivisión de 2 parcelas que comprenden 33.58 acres en 76 terrenos; demolición de 2 viviendas unifamiliares, 2 establos y eliminación de 2 unidades de casas móviles; construcción de 80 residencias, incluyendo 68 viviendas unifamiliares, 4 lotes de dúplex y 4 apartamentos; construcción de 17,000 sq. feet de espacio comercial y 9.7 acres de áreas comunes incluyendo espacio abierto y proporcionar parques futuros y desarrollo recreativo; y construcción de caminos y mejoras relacionadas, en 100 Sill Rd., Las Lomas, North Monterey County. (KK-SC)
